additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: Water, Glycerin, Distearyldimonium Chloride, Petrolatum, Cetyl Alcohol, Isopropyl Palmitate, Dimethicone, Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Flour, Caprylyl Glycol, Glyceryl Stearate, Sodium Chloride

additionalProperty.name: Warning
additionalProperty.value: Avoid contact with eyes. If the product gets into your eyes, rinse thoroughly with water. In case of any discomfort or irritation, please discontinue use and consult a physician. For external use only. Keep out of reach of children.

description: Aveeno Active Naturals Daily Moisturising Fragrance Free Lotion
name: Active Naturals Daily Moisturising Fragrance Free Lotion
